etymology.interpretation: The character 竹(竹) (zhú, "bamboo") visually represents two stalks of bamboo with leaves at the top, illustrating the appearance of bamboo plants traditionally found in nature.

examples.chinese: 这根竹(這根竹)坚韧且美丽(堅韌且美麗)。
examples.pinyin: Zhè gēn zhú jiān rèn qiě měi lì.
examples.english: This bamboo is strong and beautiful.

examples.chinese: 竹子在风中摇曳(竹子在風中搖曳)，发出沙沙的声音(發出沙沙的聲音)。
examples.pinyin: Zhúzi zài fēng zhōng yáo yè, fā chū shā shā de shēng yīn.
examples.english: The bamboo sways in the wind, making a rustling sound.
